about_the_game:
Team up with your friends to find and save your baby otters in this multiplayer co-op party game! Solve puzzles to bring the baby otters back to the zoo, unlock hats you can use to customize your otter, and be more helpful than the other players to be named the winner! Players may also choose to explore the various levels within this game to discover their secrets!

Features local and online multiplayer modes! Can you and your friends sort through the chaos to get the job done?

Once you bring the baby otters back to the zoo, the game becomes a mad dash to decide who can guide the most baby otters back to the otter exhibit! can you send more of them to safety than your friends?

Tons of secret, unlockable hats are waiting to be found within the game! will you be able to unlock them all?

Our team has been working hard on this student project and hope that players have a good time playing!

name: Otter Chaos

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Otter chaos is a 3D cute, cooperative puzzle solving game where you play as otters who scramble to chase their mischievous babies back home before the zookeeper notices!
